trends: There have been no other sightings in Groton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside on sept. 9th 2002 at approx. 930 p.m. and observeda largepulsating object heading east on the horizon. All of the sudden a blinkingobject flew towards it, then a small white sphere shot out of it at a 45 degreeangle.Then the large object changed direction and began traveling south until itdisappeared on the horizon. I have a really compelling video
Summary: saw very large, bright object, smaller object shot
